text: Bhakti Charu Swami (17 September 1945 – 4 July 2020) was an Indian spiritual leader. He was a member of the International Society for Krishna Consciousness (ISKCON). He was a disciple of ISKCON's founder A. C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada. Swami was born in the Bengal Presidency. Swami died on 4 July 2020 from COVID-19 in Florida, aged 74.Bhakti Charu Swami Passes Away: ISKCON चे प्रमुख गुरु ‘भक्ति चारू स्वामी’ यांनी अमेरिकेत घेतला अखेरचा श्वास; कोरोना विषाणूमुळे झाले निधन ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian educators Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Florida
title: Bhakti Charu Swami
